content: Lanž, a knight and humble servant, greets Duke Vratislav with respect and admiration for his just rule and diligent leadership. He introduces himself as a long-time admirer of the duke's governance and expresses his hope to prove himself worthy of the duke's trust and confidence in the future. Despite his initial nervousness, Lanž maintains a polite and formal demeanor throughout their conversation, displaying his loyalty and dedication to serving the duke.
